channel.title: Packaging, run.bat
channel.description:
Heres my run.bat.
@echo off cd ../bin title Running Server java -Xmx1012m com.revival.server pause
heres my server.class location: bin\com\revival my batch files are in a different folder to my java files (src folder) and class files (bin folder) cd../bin directs the batch file to the right location. my compiler works, but i cant get run working. when i run it i get this error. [URL=http://www.picturepush.com/public/2119390][IMG]http://www2.picturepush.com/photo/a/2119390/img/2119390.png[/img][/URL] Any help please?
